main event: A witness in Shepherdsville, Kentucky observed a bright, silvery object with a bluish glow in 1968.
interesting points: The object was apparently below the horizon initially, then came up and was surrounded by a bluish glow.
The object moved at varying speeds and altitudes, and disappeared and reappeared at times.
The witness observed the object for about 15 minutes.
The Air Force requested additional details from the witness to help evaluate the report.
No other investigative actions were taken by the Air Force based on the available information.
sighted object: a bright, silvery object with a bluish glow
